title: Insurrection Self Own, Fast Food Makes Faster Athletes? 7.29.21
itunes:title: Insurrection Self Own, Fast Food Makes Faster Athletes? 7.29.21
description:
In episode 961, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Caitlin Gill to discuss a restaurant that only allows un-vaccinated people, Mo Brooks being dumb, the connection between the Olympics and fast food, Anna's Streaming Corner, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Huntington Beach Restaurant Requires Proof People Are UN-Vaccinated
  2. Mo Brooks is NOT smart
  3. Pizza Hut Japan offering ‘Decathlon Pizza’ with 10 types of meat during the Tokyo Olympics
  4. As The Tokyo Olympics Begin, U.S. Companies Are Moving Forward With Campaigns Despite The Pandemic
  5. Olympic athletes love McDonald’s. But its role in PyeongChang will be the smallest in decades.
  6. Pizza Hut Japan’s decathlon meat pizza is an Olympic feat
  7. Wish it was a Whopper? Burger King plays on iconic gold medal bite in marketing stunt
  8. Your Chipotle Burrito Might Come Wrapped In Gold Foil. Here's Why
  9. Anna’s Streaming Corner: We Are Lady Parts
  10. Guarantee Shirts
  11. Listen: Deep Tan - Camelot

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
